name: StreetStep: 21st Century Basketball
description:
A Basketball Battle for the Ages! Think fast and use stylish moves to dunk on the competition!

Take on your friends in the freshest 3 on 3 College Basketball League!
Elite Players battle it out equipped with the hottest skills the world's ever seen!
Shoot with precision from Downtown, or take it to the paint to unleash a Showstopping Dunk!
The defense in this Town is no joke, but a well timed "Street Step" can unleash the full power of your Offense!

Features
-Fast paced and frantic head to head action! Ball against your friends on the couch or against an array of challenging CPUs!
-Eight unique teams with their own strengths and weaknesses, along with eight alternate Loadouts with their own unique properties!
-A challenging arcade-style gauntlet, with eight unique routes! Rep your favorite team, take on the best in the country, and soar to the top of that Bracket!

Notes
Platform supported: Windows 7+
Input supported: Xinput (Xbox One/Series Controller recommended), Keyboard
